00013 #ifndef MAXPATHLEN
00014 # define MAXPATHLEN 1024
00015 #endif
00016 
00017 static void make_filename(const char *name, char *filename); 
00018 static void make_init_fn(const char *name, char *init_fn);

00020 #ifdef _WIN32
00021 # include <windows.h>
00022 #else
00023 typedef void *HMODULE;
00024 typedef void (*FARPROC)();
00025 #ifndef SUN_DL
00026 #define SUN_DL
00027 #endif
00028 #include <dlfcn.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #ifdef _WIN32
00032 
00033 #define PREFIX ""
00034 #define SUFFIX ".dll"
00035 
00036  static void display_w32_error_msg(const char *additional_message) 
00037  { 
00038    LPVOID msg_buf; 
00039  
00040    FormatMessage(FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER, 
00041                NULL, GetLastError(), 0, 
00042                (LPTSTR)&msg_buf, 0, NULL); 
00043    fprintf(stderr, "scheme load-extension: %s: %s", additional_message, msg_buf); 
00044    LocalFree(msg_buf); 
00045  } 
00046 
00047 static HMODULE dl_attach(const char *module) {
00048   HMODULE dll = LoadLibrary(module);
00049   if (!dll) display_w32_error_msg(module); 
00050   return dll; 
00051 }
00052 
00053 static FARPROC dl_proc(HMODULE mo, const char *proc) {
00054   FARPROC procedure = GetProcAddress(mo,proc); 
00055   if (!procedure) display_w32_error_msg(proc); 
00056   return procedure; 
00057 }
00058 #if 0
00059 static void dl_detach(HMODULE mo) {
00060  (void)FreeLibrary(mo);
00061 }
00062 #endif
00063 #elif defined(SUN_DL)
00064 
00065 #include <dlfcn.h>
00066 
00067 #define PREFIX "lib"
00068 #define SUFFIX ".so"
00069 
00070 static HMODULE dl_attach(const char *module) {
00071   HMODULE so=dlopen(module,RTLD_LAZY);
00072   if(!so) {
00073     fprintf(stderr, "Error loading scheme extension \"%s\": %s\n", module, dlerror()); 
00074   }
00075   return so;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static FARPROC dl_proc(HMODULE mo, const char *proc) {
00079   const char *errmsg;
00080   FARPROC fp=dlsym(mo,proc);
00081   if ((errmsg = dlerror()) == 0) {
00082     return fp;
00083   }
00084   fprintf(stderr, "Error initializing scheme module \"%s\": %s\n", proc, errmsg);
00085  return 0;
00086 }
00087 #if 0
00088 static void dl_detach(HMODULE mo) {
00089  (void)dlclose(mo);
00090 }
00091 #endif 
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 pointer scm_load_ext(scheme *sc, pointer args)
00095 {
00096    pointer first_arg;
00097    pointer retval;
00098    char filename[MAXPATHLEN], init_fn[MAXPATHLEN+6];
00099    char *name;
00100    HMODULE dll_handle;
00101    void (*module_init)(scheme *sc);
00102    
00103    if ((args != sc->NIL) && is_string((first_arg = pair_car(args)))) {
00104       name = string_value(first_arg);
00105       make_filename(name,filename);     
00106       make_init_fn(name,init_fn);     
00107       dll_handle = dl_attach(filename);
00108       if (dll_handle == 0) {
00109          retval = sc -> F;
00110       }
00111       else {
00112          module_init = (void(*)(scheme *))dl_proc(dll_handle, init_fn);
00113          if (module_init != 0) {
00114             (*module_init)(sc);
00115             retval = sc -> T;
00116          }
00117          else {
00118             retval = sc->F;
00119          }
00120       }
00121    }
00122    else {
00123       retval = sc -> F;
00124    }
00125    
00126   return(retval);
00127 }
00128 
00129 static void make_filename(const char *name, char *filename) {
00130  strcpy(filename,name);
00131  strcat(filename,SUFFIX);
00132 }         
00133 
00134 static void make_init_fn(const char *name, char *init_fn) {
00135  const char *p=strrchr(name,'/');/*CHECK ME MINGW PATH SEPARATOR*/
00136  if(p==0) {
00137      p=name;
00138  } else {
00139      p++;
00140  }
00141  strcpy(init_fn,"init_");
00142  strcat(init_fn,p);
00143 }
